verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
He can do all things
No matter how impossible
All power belongs to him
He is able, more than able

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Covenant keeping God
You are the way maker
Your word is Yea and Amen
You will never fail
Miracle working God
Your word is Yea and Amen
You will never fail

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Onyenememma
Isi nke ndu
Your word is Yea and Amen
You will never fail
Onye na ememma
Isi nke ndu
Your word is Yea and Amen
YOU WILLL NEVER FAIL.
